about_the_game:
In Wyoming Winter you and a group of fellow employees find yourselves snowed in to the Wyoming department of defence building as a blizzard covers the state. You'll soon find out your group is not the only thing trapped in the building. Find unique hiding spots, help your fellow employees, complete risky lockdown tasks and find a weapon to fight back.

Hide in. Hold out. Don't be found.


Wyoming Winter is a multiplayer game where one person in the lobby is chosen at random to be the Blight, an almost invincible, fast moving, dark creature that escaped from the lower levels of the Wyoming facility. The rest of the players are employees who's job it is to stop the Blight from escaping the facility. Employees need to kill the Blight before the 10 minutes timer is over or the director of the department will have no choice but to detonate the on site nuclear bomb, killing everyone.

Wyoming Winter is best played with 3-8 players. Servers are available in Europe, America & Asia.


Employee's start with a notepad of tasks and a watch. The notebook contains a list of tasks to be completed before the employee is given a final task to locate a weapon. The watch shows how much time is lef t until the on-site nuclear bomb detonates, killing everyone, the employees must kill the Blight before this timer ends or face nuclear destruction. The Blight has heightened vision and can see well in dark places along with incredible strength that allows it to snap the neck of any employee in an instant. Both the Blight & employees can climb and crouch into unique and crafty hiding places using the climbing system.

Wyoming Winter is a multiplayer game where one person in the lobby is chosen at random to be the Blight, an almost invincible, fast moving, dark creature that escaped from the lower levels of the Wyoming facility. Wyoming Winter is best played with 3-8 players. Servers are available in Europe, America & Asia.

name: Wyoming Winter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 10 Series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 16 Series & Above
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: A group of employees find themselves snowed in to the Wyoming department of defence building as a blizzard covers the state. You'll soon find out your group is not the only thing trapped in the building.
